full_summary:
**Tender Notice: 4-Port Secure KVM Switch for the Department of Justice**
===============

Tender Reference: `SSC-24-00025776:T`
-----------------

The Department of Justice is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply of 4-port Secure KVM switches.

### Tender Overview

*   Tender Number: `SSC-24-00025776:T`
*   Solicitation Number: `BPM020713/25776`
*   Tender Status: Expired (Not applicable for this submission)
*   Tender Closing Date: `2024-02-26T14:00:00`
*   Expected Contract Start Date: None
*   Expected Contract End Date: None

### Procurement Details

*   Description of Requirement: The Department of Justice requires the supply of 4-port Secure KVM switches as per the Statement of Requirement and the List of Deliverables in the Request for Quotation.
*   Delivery Destination: Ottawa, Ontario
*   Delivery Date: Before `2024-03-28`
*   Security Requirements: None
*   Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements: None

### Procurement Method

*   Procurement Category: Government of Canada
*   Notice Type: Request for Proposal
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding

### Selected Supplier Criteria

The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

### Accessing the Solicitation

To access the solicitation and submit your bid, click the following link:

*   English: [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login)
*   French: [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/usr/login)

### Contact Information

*   Procurement Officer: Corey Griffin
*   Department: Shared Services Canada
*   Address: 400 Cooper St, 6th floor, PO Box/CP 9808 STS T CSC, Ottawa, Ontario K2P 2H8
*   Email: [Corey.Griffin@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:Corey.Griffin@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
*   Telephone:
